tooltip.scalar_tools.halitosis_sword: Allows the user to swap between an off-mode, a fire-mode, and poison-mode, when right-clicked.
tooltip.scalar_tools.prismatic_sword: Allows the user to breathe underwater, for five seconds, when right-clicked.
tooltip.scalar_tools.wither_imbued_sword: Allows the user wither their enemies, for five seconds, when attacked.
